pages.text: Said to be the beloved food of many beasts of the fey realm, wildewheet is another herb that originated in our world but has since been lost completely.$(br2)Not even the heat of a pyre can rekindle this herb.$(br2)Special care and $(l:crafting/runic_shears)runic shears$() are necessary to reach into the fey realm and retrieve a living specimen.

pages.name: Wildewheet
pages.text: The closest plant cognate in our world is simple wheat.$(br2)Using $(l:crafting/runic_shears)runic shears$() while harvesting this plant will exchange it for an equivalent from the fey realm, allowing you to acquire wildewheet.$(br2)Once obtained, wildewheet becomes a $(l:herbs/wildewheet#renew)renewable resource$().

pages.title: Renewability
pages.text: With a careful hand, suitable seeds can be obtained from wildewheet itself.$(br2)Once obtained, these seeds can be planted on any farmland that supports normal crop growth.$(br2)Visually similar to wheat, wildewheet has deep golden stems that darken at the base when mature.
